name: Weeping Tale
description:
Weeping tale is an "action-RPG meets twin-stick shooter". The gameplay is focused around character progression and killing groups of enemies while relive the story of a resurrected god. The game's world is loosely based on Norse Mythology - the player follows an alternative story of Baldr, who received a second chance to live and tries to save the world from Ragnarok and the gods that went mad. Why did his killer decide to weep and grant him a new life, though?

THE DOWNLOAD BELOW IS AN EARLY ACCESS DEMO VERSION OF THE GAME.
